item.title: Flink-OpenSource-List
item.description:
Flink OpenSource List

  • 2019-flink-userportrait-main : åŸºäº Flink æµå¤„ç†çš„åŠ¨æ€å®æ—¶äº¿çº§å…¨ç«¯ç”¨æˆ·ç”»åƒç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

  • 2021-DataLinkDC/dinky : Dinky is an out of the box one-stop real-time computing platform dedicated to the construction and practice of Unified Streaming & Batch and Unified Data Lake & Data Warehouse. Based on Apache Flink, Dinky provides the ability to connect many big data frameworks including OLAP and Data Lake.
